reviewText:
This disc has terrible picture and sound quality. So unless you're a big fan of one of the principal dancers (Firebird: Gabriela Komleva, Vadim Budarin, Arkadiy Ivanenko; Petrushka: Andris Liepa), you'll be better off watching other performances of these ballets.

Two stars, only because of the historical interest in getting a glimpse of Soviet-era Russian ballet production and dancing.
